name: dice-roll-node-app
description: getting started with a dice roll app, database required for setup
author: SRTd Solutions

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && pnpm --parallel -r --no-bail clean && pnpm store prune
scripts.clean:purge: pnpm run clean && pnpm store clear
scripts.database:setup: pnpm build && pnpm migrate:init && pnpm migrate:up && pnpm seed
scripts.migrate:create: docker compose up -d postgresql && sleep 10 && pnpm -r --no-bail run migrate:create
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose up -d postgresql && pnpm -r --no-bail run migrate:down
scripts.migrate:init: docker compose up -d postgresql && sleep 15 && pnpm -r --no-bail run migrate:init
scripts.migrate:up: docker compose up -d postgresql && pnpm -r --no-bail run migrate:up
scripts.seed: docker compose up -d postgresql && pnpm -r --no-bail run seed
